newsitem.title: GREECE: Greek Feb private construction rises 2.8pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Greek Feb private construction rises 2.8pct yr/yr.

text.p: Greece's index of private construction activity measured by the construction volume based on the number of building permits issued rose 2.8 percent year-on-year in February, the National Statistics Service (NSS) said.

"In February construction volume based on the number of building permits nationwide reached 3.993 million cubic metres against 3.885 million in February 1996, an increase of 2.8 percent," NSS said in a statement.
In the first two months of the year, private construction activity was up 8.9 percent compared to the same period a year ago. Activity in the Attica region increased 9.0 percent, it added.
